definition: splendid/magnificent/abbr. for 中國光大銀行|中国光大银行[Zhong1 guo2 Guang1 da4 Yin2 hang2], China Everbright Bank
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to develop and promote/to carry forward/to bring to great height of development

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guang1 da4 Yin2 hang2

sentences.english: We are to push traditional Chinese medicine to the world and carry forward to a higher level of development.
sentences.chinese: 健心人要把中藥推向世界，將其發揚光大。

sentences.english: It would be only the second Chinese brokerage firm to launch an IPO.
sentences.chinese: 光大證券將成爲第二家進行IPO的中國證券公司。

sentences.english: Laizhou Guangda Electronic Commerce Co. , Ltd. is a civil-run S&T enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 萊州光大電子商務有限公司是民營科技企業。

sentences.english: People in Hongkong are fond of making soup.
sentences.chinese: 香港是廣東“湯文化”的發揚光大者。

sentences.english: So we have sufficient reason to carry forward and further develop it in perpetuity.
sentences.chinese: 我們有理由永遠把它繼承併發揚光大。

sentences.english: Democracy will one day prosper in the country.
sentences.chinese: 民主終有一天會在這個國家發揚光大。

sentences.english: Therefore, I firmly believe that Guqin will enjoy a bright future of development.
sentences.chinese: 我堅信古琴的發展趨勢必然是能夠發揚光大的。

sentences.english: Cuima people Strip, yellow groove Yao cattle.
sentences.chinese: 金光大道人催馬，黃土高坡口吆牛。

sentences.english: From China Merchants Securities and Everbright Securities information has fully proved this point.
sentences.chinese: 來自招商證券和光大證券的信息已充分證明了這一點。

sentences.english: Can make the Confucianism thoroughfare thought reserve and promote.
sentences.chinese: 使儒家孔孟思想得以保留並且發揚光大。

sentences.english: On top of the ranking, is China Everbright Bank.
sentences.chinese: 排名第一的是中國光大銀行。

sentences.english: Should be in the requirements of the Securities and Futures Commission, Everbright Securities for an explanation of the pricing issue .
sentences.chinese: 應中證監的要求，光大證券對發行定價進行了解釋。

sentences.english: Traditionally girly styles are made even more feminine with theaddition of this fun print.
sentences.chinese: 這些趣味十足的印花將傳統的柔美風格發揚光大。

sentences.english: Fifthly, the paper analyses the possibility of loan from Guangda bank.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分，分析了光大銀行參與項目貸款的可行性。

sentences.english: For example, you may choose two Empyrial Archangels and three Plains.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，你可以選擇兩個穹光大天使與三個平原。
